entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
